text: yadi tum un logon ke paas, jinhen kitaab dee gaee thee, koee bhee nishaanee le aao, phir bhee ve tumhaare qibale ka anusaran nahin karenge aur tum bhee usake qibale ka anusaran karane vaale nahin ho. aur ve svayan paraspar ek-doosare ke qibale ka anusaran karanevaale nahin hain. aur yadi tumane us gyaan ke pashchaat, jo tumhaare paas aa chuka hai, unakee ichchhaon ka anusaran kiya, to nishchay hee tumhaaree ganana zaalimon mein hogee
